og.title: Immigration lawsuit: Is it justified?

twitter.description: Super Tuesday columnists Matthew Cohen '18 and Johnathan Bowes '15 debate the legality of Obama's executive action on immigration reform in reference to the recent lawsuit. Cohen argues for its necessity while Bowes claims it is unconstitutional.
